name: Viber Diamond Rush
description:
A hilarious match 3 puzzle with your favorite Viber character, LegCat! LegCat needs your help to retrieve the diamonds and treasures!

Fun match 3 puzzle with comical LegCat reactions
Get cumulative daily bonuses with premium content
Compete with Viber friends for your spot on the leaderboard
Exchange useful gifts with your Viber friends
Diverse level design and location artwork
A lifetime of free level pack updates and tons of new features!

Complete hundreds of levels as you travel through land and sea in search of precious diamonds. Compete against your Viber friends and see who can get the highest score on the leaderboard!

Key Features:
+ 120 levels
+ 4 game modes
+ Hints and power-ups
+ Play with Viber friends
+ Premium gifts
+ Amazing LegCat animations

Viber Diamond Rush is an absolutely free game to play, but you can buy additional features like moves and power-ups to help you progress faster. Download now!
